abstract: Adamas Pharmaceuticals closed a $40 million Series D round of funding this week, the company said. The round was led by Aeris Capital and DAG Ventures.
snippet: Adamas Pharmaceuticals closed a $40 million Series D round of funding this week, the company said. The round was led by Aeris Capital and DAG Ventures.
lead_paragraph: Adamas Pharmaceuticals closed a $40 million Series D round of funding earlier this week, the company said in a news release.

abstract: Expresso Fitness has raised $6 million in Series D funding with existing investors Sierra Ventures, Physic Ventures and Enterprise Partners Venture Capital, the company said.
snippet: Expresso Fitness has raised $6 million in Series D funding with existing investors Sierra Ventures, Physic Ventures and Enterprise Partners Venture Capital, the company said.
lead_paragraph: Expresso Fitness has raised $6 million in Series D financing with existing investors Sierra Ventures, Physic Ventures and Enterprise Partners Venture Capital participating in the round, the company said.

headline.main: Expresso Fitness Stirs Up $6 Million in D Round
